Articles.Content:
I'm not one much for these, bit shy in new social situations, but I don't feel it's right to just barge right in.

You can call me Zero.

I only got started playing KSP about three weeks ago. I found Kerbal in a rather roundabout fashion. I was watching video clips of the Falcon 9 booster landing when I noticed someone had shared a video of a mod for this using the Falcon 9 as strap on boosters for an SLS.

...And then I found Scott Manley's channel and the rest is basically history.

Welcome to the forums! I hope you enjoy your stay here and your gaming career with KSP!!!

BTW, Scott Manleys awesome. He has tons of tutorials and even some videos of some pretty stupid things, and also other games you may wanna try out.

Hello Zero, and welcome to the forum!

I've found the members of this community to be very helpful and friendly.  I hope you enjoy your time here.

Happy landings!

@KamenRiderzero1

Hello there and greetings! Nevermind to ask silly things here, we are nice people.
Most of us are not real Rocket scientists which is...really better so .
There are some really interesting threads in the tutorials section, take a look if the lifespan of your Kerbals doesn`t fit your ambitions!

Happy lunches launching!
